name: Annika Wilson Voice and Speech LLC
description: Voice therapy and speech services. Serving telehealth patients in North Carolina and in-person visits in the Raleigh/Durham area

itemOffered.name: Evaluation and Treatment
itemOffered.description: Pediatric and Adult SLP Evaluation and Treatment via Telehealth

itemOffered.name: Voice Therapy
itemOffered.description: Treatment for dysphonia including vocal cord edema, vocal cord atrophy, sulcus of the vocal cord, Muscle Tension Dysphonia

itemOffered.name: Vocal Cord Dysfunction Treatment
itemOffered.description: Treatment for Vocal Cord Dysfunction (VCD) and Exercise Induced Laryngeal Obstruction (EILO)

itemOffered.name: Chronic Cough Treatment
itemOffered.description: Treatment for Chronic Cough and Irritable Larynx

itemOffered.name: Gender Affirming Voice Therapy
itemOffered.description: Voice and resonance therapy for gender dysphoria and gender affirming voice
